mapper.select: select * from Study_CustomerService where userId = #{userId} order by keyNum desc

insert into Study_CustomerService (keyNum, userId, questionClass, questionTitle, questionContent, questionAnswer, questionDate, answerDate, mailMode) values(qNum.nextVal,#{userId},#{questionClass},#{questionTitle},#{questionContent},null, sysdate,null,#{mailMode})

select * from ( select rowNum as recNum, keyNum, userId, questionClass, questionTitle, questionContent, questionAnswer, questionDate, answerDate, mailMode from Study_CustomerService where userId like '%'||#{userId}||'%'
and questionClass = #{questionClass}
and questionAnswer is not null
and questionAnswer is null
order by questionDate desc) where recNum between (#{page}-1)*10+1 and #{page}*10

select * from ( select rowNum as recNum, keyNum, userId, questionClass, questionTitle, questionContent, questionAnswer, questionDate, answerDate, mailMode from Study_CustomerService where 1=1
and questionClass = #{questionClass}
and questionAnswer is not null
and questionAnswer is null
order by questionDate desc) where recNum between (#{page}-1)*10+1 and #{page}*10

select count(keyNum) from Study_CustomerService where userId like '%'||#{userId}||'%'
and questionClass = #{questionClass}
and questionAnswer is not null
and questionAnswer is null
order by questionDate desc

select count(keyNum) from Study_CustomerService where 1=1
and questionClass = #{questionClass}
and questionAnswer is not null
and questionAnswer is null
order by questionDate desc
